sourcesContent: $(document).ready(function() {'{'} $('.book-btn').click(function() {'{'} const card = $(this).closest('.card'); card.addClass('booked'); $(this).prop('disabled', true); card.find('.remove-btn').prop('disabled', false); alert(card.find('.card-title').text() + ' is booked.'); {'}'}); $('.remove-btn').click(function() {'{'} const card = $(this).closest('.card'); card.removeClass('booked'); card.find('.book-btn').prop('disabled', false); $(this).prop('disabled', true); alert(card.find('.card-title').text() + ' is removed.'); {'}'}); $('#check-booked-tables').click(function() {'{'} const bookedTables = $('.card.booked').map(function() {'{'} return $(this).find('.card-title').text(); {'}'}).get().join(', '); if (bookedTables.length > 0) {'{'} alert('Booked Tables: ' + bookedTables); {'}'} else {'{'} alert('No tables are booked.');  {'}'}     {'}'});   {'}'});
